output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes (CMF11240017) 2. Refers to candidate: Yes, mentions Marcel Ciolacu directly, who is a presidential candidate 3. Addresses wide population: Yes, it's a paid advertisement with significant reach (10,000-14,999 impressions) 4. Electoral objective: Yes, promotes PSD's governance program and Marcel Ciolacu's candidacy 5. Journalism: No, this is clearly a campaign message 6. Personal opinion: No, this is an organized campaign message with official CMF number
The post describes a campaign meeting and explicitly promotes Marcel Ciolacu and PSD's governance program. It's clearly electoral propaganda as it: - Has an official CMF number - Promotes a presidential candidate (Marcel Ciolacu) - Is a paid advertisement reaching thousands - Promotes electoral promises and program - Uses campaign hashtag #caleasigurapentruromania

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Directly promotes a presidential candidate - Makes electoral promises - Is a paid advertisement with significant reach - Uses campaign messaging and hashtags
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj de propaganda electorala pentru candidatul prezidential Marcel Ciolacu dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie. Postarea cu ID-ul 1696543720906867 contine numar CMF (CMF11240017), promoveaza explicit programul electoral si candidatul la prezidentiale Marcel Ciolacu, foloseste hashtag-uri de campanie si este promovata ca reclama platita pe Facebook dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Mesajul are caracter electoral explicit si vizeaza influentarea votului pentru alegerile prezidentiale.
